mapper.insert: insert into comments (comment_id, detail, post_id, member_id) values (comments_seq.nextval, #{detail}, #{post_id}, #{member_id})
mapper.update: update comments set detail = #{detail} where comment_id = #{comment_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from comments where member_id = #{member_id} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
